title: Andrew Johnson National Historic Site: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       Permits:   Wedding Permit for the Andrew Johnson Homestead Document Type: Word   Reservations:   Reservations are required for the Homestead tour only. Tours are given daily at 10:30, 11:30, 1:30, 2:30, and 3:30 on a first-come, first-served basis. Tours are limited to 12. Make your reservation at the Visitor Center desk no later than 15 minutes prior to the time of the tour. Schools or groups with numbers larger than 12 should call the Visitor Center at 423-638-3551 to make arrangements with staff.
